website_summaries.verdict: Sizing concerns aside, it's virtually impossible to find another suit in this price range that features such durable material and holds up as well over time.
pros: Heavy duty material, holds up well over time and resists rips and tears
cons: Many customers need at least one size larger than they would typically wear

customer_reviews.title: "Anti-Rip"
customer_reviews.text: this was my second suit purchase from this company... the first one BURST at the seams when i put the pants on and squatted down ... this one BURST at the seams when i was putting the shirt/jacket on.... so if by " anti-rip" they mean that it wont tear slowly or in small segments.... they are absolutely correct.... i received this on Friday and threw it in the trash on the same day due to the quality.....
customer_reviews.author: nedboogie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This sweat suit is great. I use it to cut weight before a fight. If your intent is that of a similar nature you'll want a size or two bigger than your daily wear to fit over a sweatshirt/other clothes. (i.e. I wear mostly large clothes and bought the XL). The buyer beware piece is that the XL pants are HUGE. I would never wear them even though the jacket fits perfectly. If you are large and in charge, and want this suit for your weight loss journey look no further - this sweat suit will do the trick. Good luck and be safe.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit in a 3x even though I wear a 2x. This suit pants runs small. It did not fit. I gave that suit away and reordered it. This time in a 5x when this suit came the pant in the order were no larger. Only the top was larger. It appears to be good quality material wise. However the pants run small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerMrs P. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: this thing is fantastic. But let me tell you
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought, this thing is fantastic. But let me tell you. The inside is going to seperate from the nylon shell and your are going to find yoursesj covered in black flakes. I have used the suit about 20 times and it is worn out. Do Not Spend Your Money on this Sweat Suit.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Varnado

customer_reviews.title: Really strong material....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for doing barre work and yoga. I also ordered about 2 sizes too big where the top actually goes down to my knees (I'm 5'6") LOL. But it's all good! I'm so impressed with it because others I've used in the past would just rip after the 2nd or 3rd time wearing. This one is still going strong. Easy to wash as I put a little Purex in cold water and put it on the gentle cycle and then hang it up to air dry in no time. Highly recommended to all.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for lose weight, very heavy material Am so happy with it.I do 2 hour cardio and sweet like crazy and the size runs lil big,but perfect for u move at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Tomas PA

customer_reviews.title: The Best Sweat Suit
customer_reviews.text: I Love this one. I was so frustrated with suits that would rip in the seams in just two uses but the benefits of sweat suits (tons of sweat) kept me buying them spending tons of money. Here comes this one and it sure is heavy duty and comftrable and i seemed to sweat way more than the other suits i think due to the cut and fit. Buy a size up or two. Prepare your water you will sweat alot!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meaty Pops

customer_reviews.title: the suit is fine and helps promote sweat when working out or just ...
customer_reviews.text: the suit is fine and helps promote sweat when working out or just walking around the house. But if you do not wear something beneath it is extremely difficult to get off once it is wet against your skin. Order a size larger than you need and it is easier I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: It's a yes.
customer_reviews.text: This suit does the job. I'm 5'5 and a few hundred lbs and I used this suit during an office weightloss challenge. I'd lost about 15 lbs on my own and I knew that I was neck and neck with one other person. I sweated out a total of 8 lbs (over the weekend) to clinch the victory (not recommending this practice for weightloss). Totally worth it. It's as comfortable as wearing something like this could be. It is extremely durable- I have ripped this thing off and thrown it around quite a bit. No holes. Also great for cold weather, keeps you warm. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I workout 7 days a week and I go through sweat suits like crazy. I have a medical condition where it’s very hard my body to produce sweat, and these are a lifesaver!! They’re durable and feel like a legit work out suit instead of wearing a plastic shower curtain liner; which is what the other cheap brands feel like! You definitely get what you pay for, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Drenches You
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help me lose water weight and weight in general in order for me to join the army. It works very well, I bought a size larger just in case it wouldn't fit me and it fit almost perfectly. It was a little too big but the velcro straps on the wrists and zipper on your ankles fixed that. It helped keep retain the heat and definitely got me drenched in sweat when I went for morning run. So far it hasn't ripped or anything so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: FallenRangerz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Size is way off. I'm a 6xl so i ordered the 8xl and it still was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN ROSARIO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for us Big Guys trying to shed some fat!
customer_reviews.text: Well, all I can say is, WOW! The suit works extremely well in making you sweat, I mean SWEAT! I also like the fact that the suit helps in retaining heat so that your muscles stay warm. I use this suit during my weight training and cardio afterwards. If you work out a lot, it will help you stay flexible. It's extremely durable, as I am a 370lb, 5'10" weight lifter with a 58" chest, 36" thighs, 22" arms, and a fat 55" gut. I got the 6XL and it fits like a snug glove. I will continue using this suit as long as I am working out. Thanks Kutting weight for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley's Mobile Auto Repair

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a quality sauna suit. This one was just what I needed. It is very durable and hasn't ripped yet after 3 months of use. I highly recommend it over some of the cheaper ones if you're looking for something that is going to last a long time. Still waiting to see if it will every rip.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I could fill up a bottle with the amount of sweat I end up with at the end of my workouts. I am not one to easily sweat and this suit gets the job done. It does run small. I usually order a 2x (I am 290lbs, size 42I on my boobs), I ordered a 4x in this suit and it fits perfect. However, if you have large legs, I suggest going up to a 5x. It's really the bottoms that run small. The top was fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gleghorn

customer_reviews.title: Great value and durability
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Runs slightly small. This is very sturdy. I have used it several ocassions on several exercises and it has held up like a tank. Very easy to clean and to put on. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: RUBEN R.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your finale because that's the last time you will enjoy this suit.
customer_reviews.text: The size and comfort leave no question. However, the inner thigh is already falling apart with a hole. Not good since I've only worn it once. I used it for bike riding and I'm guessing that's what caused the rip. But still, after only one bike ride. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Led-Head

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sauna suit
customer_reviews.text: Decent sauna suit, gets the job done. It runs small so keep that in mind. I wear a 4x tshirt and needed a 6x suit, but that's my fault for having such a big gut. Still fits a lil bit snug around the midriff but I'm sure It'll loosen up in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Young Hecty

customer_reviews.title: This sauna suit is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This sauna suit is amazing!!. I really like using it during my cardio and strength training workout. In all honesty it works better than the everlast sauna suit brand. Although I was doing flutter kicks and it ripped a little, but I fixed it by sewing it. If it rips completely then I will gladly get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Works great heavy duty. The wal mart ones i usually rip in about a week and these are still in good shape. Thick flexible material gets the sweat going good. Velcro wrist straps is nice too for keeping insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Day-o

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've ever bought. The suit is so well made. The material is thick yet comfortable. I am doing the T25 workout videos and I am sweating a whole lot more thanks to this!! I am 195p and purchased the xl
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: this material is sturdy and does not rip
customer_reviews.text: Although, this material is sturdy and does not rip, it breathes and does not cause perspiration that much. Unfortunately, the cheap plastic suits that you buy at your local store produce much more sweat. This suit is decent for jogging or simply working out, but not sweating. Save you money and buy a cheap throw-away suit, with the understanding that the cheap ones will tear. But at only around $7 a pop, that's the trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Brown  III

customer_reviews.title: The size (large) that I picked was perfect. I based it on my previous experience with ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is durable. I have been using it (not daily) for several months already and it has not ripped which it was my issue with other sauna suits. The size (large) that I picked was perfect. I based it on my previous experience with other similar products. Previously, extra large had been too big so I opted for a Large with this product. I guess it depend on the person's body type (height and weight).
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Subuyuj

customer_reviews.title: This the most durable sweat suit I have ever used ...
customer_reviews.text: This the most durable sweat suit I have ever used or seen anywhere. This suit will outlast any other out there by 50 times any previous one you've used.
customer_reviews.author: art630

customer_reviews.title: It’s works, sometimes too well
customer_reviews.text: Want to sweat? This will do the trick immediately. Hard to clean and it gets sticky after all the sweat. And if you sweat a lot it runs down the sleeves and soaks your hand which isn’t ideal when working out
customer_reviews.author: D&E0628

customer_reviews.title: Great if you’re on the move
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad a few months ago and he still uses it today. Great gift. He used to buy a bunch of cheap ones that started hurting his pocket. This works so much better
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Sweating is good for you, this suit is good too.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the cheap Golds suit, it will rip. Spend a little more on this one and you will get a good sweat with out the rip. Order a size up. I am 5/11 and 155 and medium is almost to small. Good suit. Be sure to replace your minerals and electrolytes when you sweat (Celtic sea salt-NOT Gatorade)
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The suit claimed to be of really good material, mi e arrived with a whole on the leg, used tape and hope it doesn’t rip anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Estephanie Arango

customer_reviews.title: This suit is good but it’s extremely small
customer_reviews.text: This suit is good but it’s extremely small. I ordered a 2XL and it fits very tight on your body. I’m thinking of ordering a 3XL. I’m size 42 in the waist and the 2XL is small and very hard to get in and out of. Plus the material is already ripping on the inside thigh part. If you order this you’re going to have to order a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Peeling off? Maybe defective? :/
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after having a great experience for the first 3 wearings. this suit began to peel off on the inside losing the “thermal factor” all the area of the inner legs is now translucent and no heat is kept inside the pants anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit is fantastic. I do a 30 minute workout and the sweat is just dripping off me. I did go a size larger because of the reviews and it worked out perfectly i normally wear large and went for the xl and it worked out perfectly . The material is also very strong i love it.
customer_reviews.author: M Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Does not follow size guidelines in a real person.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3x in men's the top looks like a 1x which will fit but the bottoms are way too small and is in no way true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small, you have to order 2 or 3 times your size
customer_reviews.text: Runs extremely small, I usually purchase a 4X so I can have a bit more space when working out, and being a big person, I purchased a 5X and could not even pull it down my chest, gave it to wife and she put it on with a bit of struggle and she wears Large or X large on Stuff like this, so I guess I will have to purchase a 6 or 7X so it can fit me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweating
customer_reviews.text: You will sweat your ass off. Heavy duty material and construction. Very tight in the neck area. Sweat will drip out like a faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Cayo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality,  looks much better but still no more durable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not quality as represented. After just a few uses it is coming apart. I have bought similar style suit for less than half the cost. It definitely looked like a better quality suit but doesn’t hold up ant better in the gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great. Has lasted for years with my winter runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Has lasted for years with my winter runs and basement spins on a bike.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these in the past and was satisfied with the results regarding durability. They would last about 4 mos. I recently purchased two more sets and after less than a month of use the inside material is literally falling apart and out. I contacted the seller and told him of the problem. His solution has been to ignore me.
customer_reviews.author: tim davis

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: there small for the stated size I ordered a xl but it fit like a m-l I think there good but for the price its stretching if there worth it. order a couple sizes larger if you buy this. i'm a big guy 6ft1 245 so I need a least a 2-3x
customer_reviews.author: mike-texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for instant weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Want to lose some weight??? This is exactly what you need. Just remember to drink lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED THIS SUIT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THIS SUIT. EVEN THOUGH I HAD TO ORDER A 8XL BECAUSE I WEAR A 3XL, THE EXTRA ROOM IS PERFECT FOR ME SO SO THAT I WON'T TEAR IT STRETECHING ETC. WAS WORTH MY MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Sauna Suit ~ Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Product, second one I have purchased from them and I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: to small wasted my money i even took a larger size for ...
customer_reviews.text: to small wasted my money i even took a larger size for nothing still too small wierd sizes ,, be carefull ordering
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Resto Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money !!! Put this on for 5 minutes and the seats bust open .smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size up, and you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The material quality feels soft yet strong and flexible. Your body heats up fast to began sweating. I'm glade I brought one size up from my normal size...I strongly suggest all buyers to do the same. My husband is now buying 2 sizes up because he has very thick legs...just to be safe, "I concur"
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Janice

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: This sweat sauna suit it worked very well for me in the first month but after that it started to rip in between the crotch area just like my cheaper Sauna suits did previously so I had to send this one back and now I will continue to search for some sauna suits that will not deteriorate within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Dontae562

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. The pockets are not waterproof. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The pockets are not waterproof. If you put your phone in the leg or front pocket and you are sweating, your phone WILL GET WET. So be careful. It helped me cut weight when I was in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Anm

customer_reviews.title: Cut very small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4XL sauna suit and it didn't fit as sized... I sent it back and ordered a 6xl thinking I'd have more room... well that wasn't the case, the 6x fit the same in the torso area but the arms were bigger.. and to top it off.. it ripped at the seem on the right side on the 1st day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The top is wonderful. I did not like the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: The top is wonderful. I did not like the fact that the top was large and that bottoms were more medium. The bottoms just about tore when I put them on. This is not good. The top does make you sweat, but I had to put on a sweat shirt over it for that to happen. I really prefer the less expensive brands. They seem to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: A bit snug in my size but works!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 stars because I ordered my size but it’s hard to pull off over my head.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This thing does what it's supposed to do! My ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing does what it's supposed to do! My son is on the varsity wrestling team as well as a seasoned boxer. He's used this on several occasions to make weight for an event. Don’t know how safe any of these sauna suits are, but if you're in a pinch to make weight for a tournament, this will help get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: S. ATILES

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back and I did receive a refund for this item so that was great.
customer_reviews.text: it didn't fit, I order the largest size a 5x but it was still too small, so buyer beware if you need a larger size I would be careful about what you order and always go up in sizes. I sent it back and I did receive a refund for this item so that was great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This suit is awesome. You can't help but sweat in it. Anything you are wearing underneath it will be soaked like you jumped in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pants runs small!
customer_reviews.text: It makes you sweat a ton!!! The shirt seems to be true to size but he pants run super small. No way to really win unless you buy two suits of two different sizes which is really a waste of money. I'm getting a good kick out of the shirt atleast!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4x but it was as though it was an XL. Horrible, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: goLunas

customer_reviews.title: Suit fits smaller people who don't need it.
customer_reviews.text: I was advised to order the next size up because they run small, so to be safe he normally wear 4x, I ordered the 8x and the pants are too small. The top fit but a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Ederine Amelia Kirkendoll

customer_reviews.title: Improper Sizing
customer_reviews.text: This suit wasn't true to size in the fit. The size is off by 2 sizes. I bought it for my husband and it wasn't what I expected at all. We were truly dissatisfied with the merchandise. Being that it's an exercise garment it should be made a little larger due to the material. The quality was okay but it wasn't going to last long. The pants was more of the problem than the top. They were not made for large people who are trying to lose weight. They were made for large people who are trying to trim down.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on 7-18-2017. I used it numerous times during my work out. However I noticed black speaks on my bedroom floor. I figures out they were coming from the sweat suit, on the in side. From both arm pits and the stomach area. I was wondering is this normal wear and tear. When I examined it , it was pealing off. is there a warranty. Thanks Martin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It aint no miracle suit! You got to put in work !
customer_reviews.text: It does what its suppose to do! Really drenched you in sweat. That being said , this isnt some miracle suit that will make you drop weight on its own. You have to put in hard work at the gym in order for this suit to work! My only issue with this suit is major, the quality. Very cheap. It was good for about 2 months and then the seams ripped down the side and after I sewed it back up the actual suit teared week later.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not durable / not rip proof
customer_reviews.text: By the description I thought this suit would be durable (as promoted) and only after 12 uses the seams in the pants are coming apart. Not much behind the anti-rip and durable claim. Tried calling support, no answer, tried live chat and no one chatter and after 15 mins I gave up. Also, no reply to email.
customer_reviews.author: keith davis

customer_reviews.title: I didn't really test it out yet but even taking ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really test it out yet but even taking out the box i tried it on and luckily I ordered a few sizes up because it somewhat just fit and I ordered two sizes above my regular size
customer_reviews.author: lennie green

customer_reviews.title: Shirt is good, but the pants ripped on the 3rd time ...
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is good,but the pants ripped on the 3rd time I use them to jog, I order them 2 sizes bigger ,they fit a little baggier so I was surprised when they tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: niceeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: Love it..great heavy material.looks cool and you sweat maby 20 time's more if you do your activities in this suit. ..even my wrist and arms sweat....just buy it 2 or 3 size bigger...it doesn't matter if its a little big because shirt and pants have elastic in the waistline. And in sleeves and ankle. ..
customer_reviews.author: BIG VIC

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: I am super bummed i thought 6XL would be enough but its not i need to get 8XL, other wise i think i would have liked it. i know we cant send back because of virus . Please let me know how to get bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Schroth

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying my Suit
customer_reviews.text: There were some issues with the delivery. As soon as I made contact with the seller, they made good on the issues that arised and remained in constant contact with me until the delivery. I will share my experience with ARD sweat suit and encourage people to use this products. Thanks for backing up your product and word. Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other "sauna suits" before but this one is great. Alot more durable than the cheap ones I've wasted money on in the past. Good closures to keep the heat in, great sizing and love having pockets. An all around great product I'd definitely recommend to anyone wanting a high quality sauna suit...
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Large frame female 5'8... I ordered 6x ...
customer_reviews.text: Large frame female 5'8...I ordered 6x; pants are about 3-4" too long, but waist and thighs are an OK fit and top is 3 sizes too big. Waiting for return instructions. Placed new order for 3x....will re-rate once refund is processed and the 3x is received.
customer_reviews.author: dink

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Get a size larger than you regularly war just so you have room because for me I bought this in a 2xl and wouldn't dare run in this because I know that the pants will rip so just be cautious and get a size up for more mobility but other than that this thing does its job pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super Suit
customer_reviews.text: Suit was exactly what I wanted. I have had several others in the past and they usually tore on the first couple workouts. I have been putting this one through the paces for several weeks now and not one tear. Only issue is the zipper tab on the akle pulled off and the zipper split open. Sewed the seem up and it works better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: asmness

customer_reviews.title: If you want to sweat this is the suit for ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want to sweat this is the suit for you. I wear this and get on the treadmill for 40 minutes walking at a fast pace. The amount I sweat is doubled.
customer_reviews.author: Tina18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sweat way more in this suit than my standard plastic sweat suit from Walmart. Runs large
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Massiah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product worked for like 1 month then it started to rip. Went to a new product called Kutting Weight and it amanzig.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not cheaply made and washes well in the laundry. It's still very lightweight and easy to workout in. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: D McMillian

customer_reviews.title: MAKE FAT CRY!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money! I have purchased at least 10 of the thin plastic sweat suits from Walmart over the years. This on has two layers which is nice, velcro to tighten at your wrist and you need to get a size larger. I can do without the big logo, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Helped me shed unwanted water weight. Only con is inside of suit peels.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suite EVERYTIME I wear this at the gym I sweat like crazy from head to toe, definitely recommend it, my sister is getting hers soon.
customer_reviews.author: keturah grant

customer_reviews.title: AWEOME SUIT!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I BROUGHT THIS FOR MY HUSBADNAND HE LOVE IT! HE SAID IT MAKES HIM DRENCHING WET WHILE WORKING OUT AND HE HAD SHED SOME POUNDS. MAKE SURE YOU GET THE RIGHT SIZE, THESE RUN A LIL BIG SO GO DOWN A SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: LADY V.

customer_reviews.title: This Sauna Suit looks nice and wears ok
customer_reviews.text: This Sauna Suit looks nice and wears ok. But it is not to work out in, it come apart in the Seam's and the inter lining will be the first thing to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sweat
customer_reviews.text: Good suit , produces a lot of sweat . Runs true to size I ordered a size up
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting sweat suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! This isn’t your typical sauna suit! All others tear after a certain amount of use or feel cheap! The collar is soft and doesn’t scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This top fits like a 4x but the pants where to small not ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is CLEARLY not fit to size - ordered 8x purposely for male that wears a 4x because of previous reviews. This top fits like a 4x but the pants where to small not able to be worn at all. So only utilizing the top.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Rip and Shed
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money on this suit. the pants ripped when I bent over to tie my shoes. The suit also shed on the inside. You have to clean up black shedding every time you put the suit on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Williams

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one I can't Rip or Break like I do most of my stuff
customer_reviews.text: Finally found one I can't Rip or Break like I do most of my stuff. Since most companies don't make things that last.
customer_reviews.author: zzarr

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: size runs small. First one I got was a 2 XL. Top did not fit and the pants ripped the first time I used them. I wear between a XL and XXL. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews saying that their size was too small so I edited two sizes to big and I love it!!!!!!!!!! I've had it all year and it's still as sturdy as the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia818

customer_reviews.title: and I ordered a 3XL and it fits great with room to wear clothes under it
customer_reviews.text: It's cut small, so you have to order it 2 to 3 sides bigger than what you normally wear. I'm 210 lbs and 5 feet 6 inches wearing normally medium to large, and I ordered a 3XL and it fits great with room to wear clothes under it.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be drinched
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the sweat swishing around in the suit. After working out for two hrs weight lifting and cardio, I was able to pour my sweat out through my sleeves. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gus M and Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor business
customer_reviews.text: Nice suit, good quality, but not made for a short woman, so I returned it. 3 stars for being amazon prime but not paying for return shipping! And it was not cheap...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Childhood Lasts A Lifetime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but it will rip, my tore at my are pits and thighs.
customer_reviews.author: tony brooks

customer_reviews.title: YESS
customer_reviews.text: Fits great works well I sweat allot loving this item one of the best
customer_reviews.author: meika Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Please make sure you measure yourself and use the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure you measure yourself and use the size chart. This is a mans suit so if you are a woman orders size or two bigger for hip room. This runs very, very small I can't stress this enough. Pleas use size chart!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It holds up and doesn't rip. Holds up in washer too. I had a cheap one and this one is worth the extra few bucks because you won't have to replace it after two weeks. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: One size pants fit all for suit
customer_reviews.text: When a person orders a larger size suit, the pants should not be a one size fits all, they should match the size of the suit, not just the length. The suit does the job but not comfortable on the thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. Had a few work outs ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Had a few work outs already, makes you really sweat off those calories.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: The outfit does not stretch. I bought a 5x in men and I still could not fit it and I'm a 3X in women.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna Halls

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Size is not accurate i ordered, 3 ,sizes up from my size and still was unable to fit it
customer_reviews.author: Reashina wimberly

customer_reviews.title: Gold's gym brand from Wal-Mart works better
customer_reviews.text: This suit is super small. I'm a 2x and went big thinking I would just tape if it was too big. I ordered 4x and I'm stuffed in here like a sausage. I bent to sit down and the pants ripped wide open. Even with my spanx under, this stuck to my body like I wrapped up in seran. I just tried to take it off and it caught on my elbows at shoulder level and ripped. Straight to the garbage this goes. I would have been better off buying another 9 dollar suit from Wal-Mart. They made it through a full Zumba class at least and brought a lot more sweat.
customer_reviews.author: keykey

customer_reviews.title: I will give this a 3 star because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I will give this a 3 star because of the customer service only ! These things run very small , very small ! After a while the inside coating on the material starts to crack and fall apart, you must wash by hand or it will happen even faster. No way near worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Doobie man

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great material-durable however it is one size smaller than the size displayed. Buy at least 2 size up. Hoping to exchange for the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: GGirl221

customer_reviews.title: I love this sauna sweat suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this sauna sweat suit, great material on out side, with rubber sauna inside of suit, really makes you sweat. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fortson, Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON VERIFIED PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: My son start losing weight. So that is the right stuff for detox and lose weight. I will recommend it to other friends.
customer_reviews.author: MYRNA MONTEVERDE

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty ARD Sweat Suit Sauna Exercise Gym Suit Fitness Weight Loss Anti-Rip Small to 8XL
product_meta.description: This is a Super durable high quality sweat suit with rubberized inner lining and elasticated cuffs for optimum results. This suit has been designed to provide maximum durability and performance.
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty Sweat Suit, Nylon and PVC coated fabric.
Durable and high quality sweat suit, Rubberized inner lining.
Designed to provide maximum durability and performance.
Anti rip off and tear resistant. Excellent for your gym training and loose weight as it works so quick to get the result you want.
